shortContent:
As a Full Action, make a Charm Test to extend
the effects of the character’s Hatred Talent to nearby allies.
Success on the test confers a +10 bonus to WS when fighting
hated foes to one ally per point of the character’s Fellowship
Bonus. The effects last for the duration of the encounter.
content:
The character’s belief in the righteousness of his hatred is
so ingrained in his being that he can inspire the same hate
in others. As a Full Action, make a Charm Test to extend
the effects of the character’s Hatred Talent to nearby allies.
Success on the test confers a +10 bonus to WS when fighting
hated foes to one ally per point of the character’s Fellowship
Bonus. The effects last for the duration of the encounter.
